attributes.action: Close the park on our estate as it is attracting anti social behaviour
attributes.background: We would like the park on our housing estate removed as it is attracting anti social behaviour and gangs of teenagers causing issues.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local parks are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
